      • getEntryForTarget

        public static <TTarget,​TResult> java.util.Optional<TResult> getEntryForTarget​(@NonNull
                                                                                    TTarget target,
                                                                                    @NonNull
                                                                                    @NonNull java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<?>,​TResult> map)
        Takes the given map and target and tries to extract the nearest possible type match of the target.
        Type Parameters:
        TTarget - target type
        TResult - result type of the map
        Parameters:
        target - target to find match for
        map - map to find match in
        Returns:
        extracted map value if the target type matched and was found

      • getEntryForTargetClass

        public static <TResult> java.util.Optional<TResult> getEntryForTargetClass​(@NonNull
                                                                           @NonNull java.lang.Class<?> targetClass,
                                                                           @NonNull
                                                                           @NonNull java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<?>,​TResult> map)
        Takes the given map and class and tries to extract the nearest possible type match for the class in the map.
        Type Parameters:
        TResult - the type of the result
        Parameters:
        targetClass - the target class and matching key of the map
        map - the map to extract
        Returns:
        the matched target result if found

      • isTargetType

        public static <TTarget> boolean isTargetType​(@NonNull
                                             @NonNull java.lang.Class<?> targetClass,
                                             @Nullable
                                             TTarget target)
        Checks if the target type matches the given object.

        The target can be of type Target which will extract the actual target from it first. False will be returned if the target is null.

        Parameters:
        target - the target to check against this context
        Returns:
        true if the type matches or false of the object is null or does not extend the target type
